TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class DataGridColumnCollection : System.Collections.ICollection, System.Web.UI.IStateManager

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataGridColumnCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public NotInheritable Class DataGridColumnCollection Implements ICollection, IStateManager
public ref class DataGridColumnCollection sealed : System::Collections::ICollection, System::Web::UI::IStateManager
type DataGridColumnCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable interface IStateManager

summary.span: 派生的列对象的集合，这些对象表示 控件中的列。

span.span: A collection of -derived column objects that represent the columns in a control.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 集合以编程方式管理 派生列对象的集合。Use the collection to programmatically manage a collection of -derived column objects. 这些对象表示控件中的列 。These objects represent the columns in a control. 您可以在集合中添加、删除或插入列 。You can add, remove, or insert columns in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 当 属性设置为时， `true,` 控件创建的列 不会添加到 集合中。When the property is set to `true,` the columns created by the control are not added to the collection. 控件不会将其集合的内容存储 在视图状态中。The control does not store the contents of its collection in the view state. 若要动态添加或删除列，您必须在每次刷新页面时以编程方式添加或删除列。To add or remove a column dynamically, you must programmatically add or remove the column every time the page is refreshed. 提供一个 `Page_Init` 函数，该函数在重新 加载控件状态并重新生成控件之前添加或移除列。Provide a `Page_Init` function that adds or removes the column before the control's state is reloaded and the control is rebuilt. 否则，在显示集合时，对集合所做的更改 不会反映在 控件中。Otherwise, the changes to the collection are not reflected in the control when it is displayed. > [!NOTE] > 虽然您可以通过编程方式向控件的集合中添加列或从中删除列 ，但使用静态方式列出列会更容易，并使用 属性来显示或隐藏每个列。Although you can programmatically add columns to or remove columns from the collection of the control, it is easier to list the columns statically and then use the property to display or hide each column. 集合中列的顺序决定了列在控件中的显示顺序 。The order of the columns in the collection determines the order that the columns are displayed in the control. 下表列出了从类派生的不同列类 。The following table lists the different column classes that derive from the class. |列类Column Class|说明Description| |------------------|-----------------| ||绑定到数据源中的字段的列。A column that is bound to a field in a data source. 它将字段中的每个项显示为文本。It displays each item in the field as text. 这是控件的默认列类型 。This is the default column type for the control.| ||显示列中每一项的命令按钮的列。A column that displays a command button for each item in the column. 这允许您创建自定义按钮控件的列，如 "添加" 或 "删除" 按钮。This allows you to create a column of custom button controls, such as Add or Remove buttons.| ||包含列中每一项的编辑命令的列。A column that contains editing commands for each item in the column.| ||将列中的每一项显示为超链接的列。A column that displays each item in the column as a hyperlink. 列的内容可以绑定到数据源中的字段或静态文本。The contents of the column can be bound to a field in a data source, or to static text.| ||根据指定的模板显示列中的每一项的列。A column that displays each item in the column according to a specified template. 这允许您控制列的内容，例如显示图像。This allows you to control the content of the column, for example to display images.| > [!NOTE] > 类是列出的列类的基类。The class is the base class for the column classes listed. 它不会在集合中直接使用 。It is not used directly in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用集合将 列动态添加到 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to dynamically add a column to the control. 请注意， 控件的属性 为类的实例 。Note that the property of the control is an instance of the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridCtor/CS/datagridctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridCtor/VB/datagridctorvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可将 派生列对象添加到集合的末尾 。Use this method to add a -derived column object to the end of a collection. 控件不会将其集合的内容存储 在视图状态中。The control does not store the contents of its collection in the view state. 若要动态添加或删除列，必须在每次刷新页面时以编程方式添加或删除列。To add or remove a column dynamically, you must programmatically add or remove the column each time the page is refreshed. 提供一个 `Page_Init` 函数，该函数 可在控件重新加载其状态并重新生成它之前添加或移除列。Provide a `Page_Init` function that adds or removes the column before the control can reload its state and rebuild itself. 否则，在显示集合时，对集合所做的更改 不会反映在 控件中。Otherwise, the changes to the collection are not reflected in the control when it is displayed. > [!NOTE] > 虽然您可以通过编程方式向控件的集合中添加列或从中删除列 ，但使用静态方式列出列会更容易，并使用 属性来显示或隐藏每个列。Although you can programmatically add columns to or remove columns from the collection of the control, it is easier to list the columns statically and then use the property to display or hide each column. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法将 列动态添加到 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to dynamically add a column to the control. 请注意， 控件的属性 为类的实例 。Note that the property of the control is an instance of the class. summary.span: 返回 接口，该接口包含 集合中所有由 导出的列对象。

span.span: Returns a interface that contains all the -derived column objects in the collection.

returns.span: 一个 接口，包含 中所有由 导出的列对象。

span.span: A interface that contains all -derived column objects in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可创建一个 接口，该接口可循环访问以获取集合中的每个项 。Use this method to create a interface that can be iterated through easily to get each item in the collection. 使用 属性可获取集合中当前指向的项。Use the property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection. 使用 方法移动到集合中的下一项。Use the method to move to the next item in the collection. 使用 方法可将枚举数移至初始位置。Use the method to move the enumerator to the initial position. > [!NOTE] > 必须在创建 对象之后或使用 方法将枚举器移动到集合中的第一项后调用方法。The method must be called after creating a object, or after using the method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection. 否则，由属性表示的项 是不确定的。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法创建一个 接口，该接口可循环访问以显示集合的内容 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to create a interface that can be iterated though to display the contents of the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridColumnCollection.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridColumnCollection.GetEnumerator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridColumnCollection.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridColumnCollection.GetEnumerator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

in all cases.

in all cases.

summary.span: 移除 集合中指定索引位置处由 导出的列对象。

span.span: Removes a -derived column object from the collection at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可 从 集合中的指定索引处移除派生列对象。Use this method to remove a -derived column object from a collection at the specified index. 控件不会将其集合的内容存储 在视图状态中。The control does not store the contents of its collection in the view state. 若要动态添加或删除列，必须在每次刷新页面时以编程方式添加或删除列。To add or remove a column dynamically, you must programmatically add or remove the column each time the page is refreshed. 提供一个 `Page_Init` 函数，该函数 可在控件重新加载其状态并重新生成它之前添加或移除列。Provide a `Page_Init` function that adds or removes the column before the control can reload its state and rebuild itself. 否则，在显示集合时，对集合所做的更改 不会反映在 控件中。Otherwise, the changes to the collection are not reflected in the control when it is displayed. > [!NOTE] > 虽然您可以通过编程方式向控件的集合中添加列或从中删除列 ，但使用静态方式列出列会更容易，并使用 属性来显示或隐藏每个列。Although you can programmatically add columns to or remove columns from the collection of the control, it is easier to list the columns statically and then use the property to display or hide each column. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法从集合中移除列 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to remove a column from the collection. 请注意， 控件的属性 是 集合。Note that the property of the control is the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridColumnCollection.RemoveAt Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridColumnCollection.RemoveAt Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridColumnCollection.RemoveAt Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridColumnCollection.RemoveAt Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: is less than or greater than .
